description: This file defines the Express router for handling budget-related HTTP endpoints, linking URL routes to controller functions for listing, creating, updating, and deleting budgets.

methods.name: listBudgets
methods.description: Handles retrieving the list of budgets.

methods.name: updateBudget
methods.description: Handles updating an existing budget by ID.

methods.name: deleteBudget
methods.description: Handles deleting a budget by ID.
